text:
President @realDonaldTrump has done an extraordinary job backing up states, which have the primary responsibility of aggregating resources. As of 4/16 FEMA delivered:

✅ 44 million N95 respirators
✅ 63 million surgical masks
✅ 10,000+ ventilators
✅ 8,600+ medical station beds
